Package control

Class ArrayControl

Object
ArrayControl
public class ArrayControl extends Object
The ArrayControl class provides utility methods to handle lists of objects. It supports printing lists, selecting items from lists, and allowing users to choose specific options, including projects, units, and marital status.

  • Method Details

    • printFromList

      public static void printFromList(List<Project> list, boolean showAdditionalInfo)
      Prints a list of projects, with an option to display additional information for each project.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of projects to be printed
      showAdditionalInfo - whether to show additional information for each project

    • printFromList

      public static <T> void printFromList(List<T> list)
      Prints a list of generic items with indexing for easier reading.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the items in the list
      Parameters:
      list - the list of items to be printed

    • selectFromList

      public static Project selectFromList(List<Project> list, Scanner sc, boolean showAdditionalInfo)
      Allows the user to select a project from a list of projects. The user can view additional project information if specified. If the user selects an invalid input, a message will be shown and no project will be selected.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of projects to choose from
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      showAdditionalInfo - whether to show additional project information
      Returns:
      the selected project, or null if the selection was cancelled or invalid

    • selectFromList

      public static <T> T selectFromList(List<T> list, Scanner sc)
      Allows the user to select an item from a list of generic items. The user can cancel the selection or choose an item based on the displayed list.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the items in the list
      Parameters:
      list - the list of items to choose from
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      Returns:
      the selected item, or null if the selection was cancelled or invalid

    • selectUnitType

      public static UnitType selectUnitType(Project project, Scanner sc)
      Allows the user to select a unit type from a project's available units. The user will be presented with a list of available unit types based on the project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project from which the unit types will be selected
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      Returns:
      the selected unit type, or null if the selection is cancelled

    • selectUnitType

      public static UnitType selectUnitType(Scanner sc)
      Allows the user to select a unit type from all available unit types. This is used when no specific project is provided, and a general selection is needed.
      Parameters:
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      Returns:
      the selected unit type

    • selectMaritalStatus

      public static MaritalStatus selectMaritalStatus(Scanner sc)
      Allows the user to select a marital status from the available types.
      Parameters:
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      Returns:
      the selected marital status
